txt.en: Discover the dwarf-marker in Thorin's Hall
You have found the dwarf-marker at Fordh Maru
You have found the dwarf-marker at Nár's Peak
You have found the dwarf-marker near the Pool of the King
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of Thrór and Thráin, encamped during their exile.
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of Thrór and Thráin, temporarily settled during their exile.
When Smaug threw down the dwarves of Erebor, Thrór and his family and many of their subjects escaped south, eventually crossing through Dunland and north to the Blue Mountains.
You have found the dwarf-marker near Araniant
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of Thráin, encamped during their exile.
You have found the dwarf-marker in Fordirith
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of Thráin, encamped during their exile.
You have found the dwarf-marker in Thorin's Hall
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of Thráin, encamped during their exile.
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of first Thráin then Thorin Oakenshield, finally settled during their exile.
'You have journeyed upon part of the long road upon which Thrór led us long ago. You are brave and deserving of a reward.'
Discover the camp-sites of the exiles from the Lonely Mountain.
